professional_summary: Skilled IT systems professional with expertise in database administration, data migration, systems engineering, integration, and programming. Experience in mentoring and improving productivity through effective communication and collaboration.

key_responsibilities: Developing and deploying SQL Server-based reporting solutions using Power BI.
Designing efficient data warehouses and managing ETL processes.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver actionable insights.
Administering Oracle 10G and SQL Server databases.
Implementing data migration strategies to optimize performance.
Ensuring database security and disaster recovery plans.
Analyzing data to support decision-making processes.
Developing and documenting ETL and data transformation processes.
Collaborating with business stakeholders to identify reporting needs.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
